alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 25 at 1:50PM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft, Gallatin Valley, Madison River Valley, and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
